answers.answer_content:
eat tons of veggies and fruit!!  Especially lots of greens!  This will provide tons of vitamins and minerals your hair and body needs.  Then eat your protein (eggs, nuts, chicken, trukey, beans, tofu, etc.)  And your complex carbohydrates (brown rice, ezekial bread, whole wheaet pita bread, bulgar wheat, quinoa, etc.)  And your healthy fats (olive oil, avacados, nuts(like almond) omegas (found in fish and supplements)  All these things contribute to a healthy diet, that will help your hair grow, and just make sure your eating enough of all these things especially load up on the veggies and fruit and you should get to a healthy weight.  You can add protein powder to smoothies and stuff like that. 

Then exercise, pilates and yoga will help your build lean muscle as well as promote hair growth!

Weight bearing exercise will put weight on you and will increase your appetite. Protein, good fats, and fresh fruits and vegetables are good for your hair skin and nails. Take omega  fish oil and spirulina and biotin(coupled with your multi-vitamin) will make your skin glow and your hair will grow like a weed. The weight training is guaranteed to increase your appetite.
I suggest you eat normally, whatever you prefer, because you can probably tell the difference between healthy and non-healthy (: If your weight doesn't gain steadily, that's just your body type.
